Method Detail

loadClassData

private byte[] loadClassData(java.lang.String name)
Loads the class data. All jar-files of the associated directory are searched for the wanted class. The first hit is loaded.

Parameters:
name - - The name of the class to be loaded.
Returns:
- The binary data of the class.

getJarFile

public java.util.jar.JarFile getJarFile()
Returns the File object representing the DirectoryJarClassLoader's associated directory.

Returns:
- The File representing the directory.
